name: Cooperation
text: §149A-23  Cooperation.  The department may cooperate or enter into agreements with any other agency of the State or any agency of the federal government for the purpose of carrying out this chapter and securing uniformity of rules. [L 1972, c 58, pt of §1; am L 1975, c 126, pt of §1; am L 1987, c 310, §14]
